name: The Killer Bat Disease
description:
The Killer Bat Disease is an Action Game with an interesting story.

Your goal is to kill the said amount of bats in each level.

Maybe you'll find who is behind it all in the final level.

This game contains 3 levels.

Beware that the game was made in a very short time(3.5 hours)

Maybe I'll do a better version of it later.

Have fun!

---Credits---
